---
title: "GraphLocation"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Uniquely identifies a node in a graph by its entity path and node id.

We require this because the same node id can be used in multiple entities.

## Fields

* entity_path: [`EntityPath`](../datatypes/entity_path.md)
* node_id: [`GraphNodeId`](../datatypes/graph_node_id.md)
